channel.title: How to make my server run?
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,480500.0.html I'm using this as my source and client.
I compiled.
When i click run.bat this happens
" 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
:confused:

item.title: How to make my server run?
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“Joshooa, post:3, topic:399033”]Can you PM your msn? im new to this.

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Thats when i click edit.[/quote]
Its that part, Go to your program files and find where you’re java is located, Then put the path there

like so

“C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_24/bin/java.exe”

with the quotation marks as well

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my server run?

@staticfish1 wrote:

Right click and edit Run and make sure it is set to the right Java path
